data.message: The last weeks I get like 4-5 friend requests per day from pretty dutch woman, nice ofcourse....BUT... I keep reporting them to Facebook because the pictures are all stolen from russian and polish dating and model sites. (google image to the resque) they all just made the account, and have like 1 or 2 poor guys who fell for it, and list high education and living in that town. is there any way facebook can stop this? thru checking if multibla accounts are from same IP etc?

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that you are experiencing this, Martin. Fake Timelines created to imitate real people are not allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be somebody they are not, we recommend reporting it by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1Vx6i5m. -Zack
